nodes.text: A skirmish took place on Arbiflux when Minister Pitina Mar-Mas Voor hired three bounty hunters to pursue the rogue archaeologist Chelli Lona Aphra.

The skirmish on Arbiflux appeared in the comic Doctor Aphra 34, written by Simon Spurrier, penciled by Wilton Santos, Cris Bolson, and Andrea Broccardo, and published by Marvel Comics on July 17, 2019.
